# extensionName

**Instance Property**

The name of the Media Extension.

## Declaration

```swift
var extensionName: String { get }
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the extension’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/CFBundleDisplayName].

## Inspecting the extension

- **containingBundleName**: The name of the containing app bundle.
- **extensionIdentifier**
- **extensionURL**: The file URL of the Media Extension bundle.
- **containingBundleURL**: The file URL of the host application for the Media Extension.
